description.value: At 4th level, whenever a summoner is within his eidolon's reach, the summoner gains a +2 shield bonus to his Armor Class and a +2 circumstance bonus on his saving throws. This bonus does not apply if the eidolon is @Compendium[pf1.conditions.zemoWcP2SR6FTiS1]{grappled}, @Compendium[pf1.conditions.g84rPrlfDnkUopAa]{helpless}, @Compendium[pf1.conditions.8zG4yDD2zGVSAJFH]{paralyzed}, @Compendium[pf1.conditions.assqfdN6G1URo9MZ]{stunned}, or @Compendium[pf1.conditions.bj36eCfZGJG5AGTQ]{unconscious}.
